description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The galaxy is shrinking.  Exploration remains as the current mode of man...but some parts of this great black void are better left unchecked...  Lancer Corp. Arc Division is tasked with deep space exploration, an admirable notion, but from the depths of the abyss, a new enemy emerges...one that could doom all humanity.
description.short: The galaxy is shrinking.  Exploration remains as the current mode of man...but some parts of this great black void are better left unchecked...  Lancer Corp. Arc Division is tasked with deep space exploration, an admirable notion, but from the depths of the abyss, a new enemy emerges...one that could doom all humanity.
